name: VB<>OX Visual Basic API for OpenXchange
short_description: The VB<>OX project aims at delivering an easy-to-use API for accessing an OpenXchange server from within Visual Basic (VBA) programs. It provides an abstraction layer to the VB application for hiding the complexity of the OpenXchange interfaces.
